humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " Mi " sound. " Mi " is the same as "沵", which means that the water is full and deep. "Jade articles. The Ministry of Water: "Mi, Shen Ye, Sheng Ye." Such as "Poetry. Bei Feng. "There are bitter leaves": "There are Mi Jiying, and there are pheasants singing." Mao Chuan: "Mi, deep water also." Southern Song Xie Lingyun "Shanju Fu": "Mi Mi Ping Lake, Hong Hong Cheng Yuan."

" Mi " also means full and full. For example, Gu Kuang of the Tang Dynasty "Guangling Baisha Dayun Temple Stele": "Bao Lin is restored, fragrant flowers are permeated, and the Buddhist land is everywhere, and the wind wheel is also." "Old Tang Book. Astronomical Chronicles 2": "In the midnight of the moon, there is a red light in the northwest, the flames are in the sky, running through the purple, and gradually flowing in the east, permeating the north, shining for dozens of miles, and it will disappear for a long time.
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " Mi " sound. " Mi " is the same as "沵", which means that the water is full and deep.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「彌」聲。「瀰」同「濔」，表示水滿、水深之貌。《玉篇．水部》：「瀰，深也，盛也。」如《詩．邶風．匏有苦葉》：「有瀰濟盈，有鷕雉鳴。」毛傳：「瀰，深水也。」南朝宋謝靈運〈山居賦〉：「瀰瀰平湖，泓泓澄淵。」

　　「瀰」也表示充滿、布滿。如唐代顧況〈廣陵白沙大雲寺碑〉：「復有寶林，香花瀰漫，周徧佛土，風輪是也。」《舊唐書．天文志下》：「其月壬子夜，西北方有赤光見，炎赫亙天，貫紫微，漸流于東，瀰漫北方，照耀數十里，久之乃散。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「彌」聲。「瀰」同「濔」，表示水滿、水深之貌。

從「 水 」，「 彌 」聲。「 瀰 」同「 濔 」，表示水滿、水深之貌。《玉篇．水部》：「瀰，深也，盛也。」如《詩．邶風．匏有苦葉》：「有瀰濟盈，有鷕雉鳴。」毛傳：「瀰，深水也。」南朝宋謝靈運〈山居賦〉：「瀰瀰平湖，泓泓澄淵。」 「 瀰 」也表示充滿、布滿。如唐代顧況〈廣陵白沙大雲寺碑〉：「復有寶林，香花瀰漫，周徧佛土，風輪是也。」《舊唐書．天文志下》：「其月壬子夜，西北方有赤光見，炎赫亙天，貫紫微，漸流于東，瀰漫北方，照耀數十里，久之乃散。」

瀰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐ］［mí］
［《廣韻》綿婢切，上紙，明。］
［《廣韻》武移切，平支，明。］
“弥3”的繁体字。
(1)水深满貌。
(2)深水。
(3)充满，遍布。
(4)见“瀰迤”。

瀰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀰； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页660第31
【廣韻】武移切【集韻】【韻會】民?切，?音彌。渺瀰，水曠遠之貌。【木華·海賦】渺瀰湠漫。　又【廣韻】綿婢切【韻會】母婢切，?音弭。瀰瀰，水流貌。【詩·邶風】河水瀰瀰。　又水滿也。【詩·邶風】有瀰濟盈。　又【廣韻】奴禮切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乃禮切，?音禰。又【集韻】母禮切【正韻】莫禮切，?音米。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　Mi; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 660 31
[Guang Yun] Wu Yiqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] People? Cut, sound Mi. Miao Mi, the vast waters. 【Muhua·Haifu】Small and subtle.　[Guang Yun] Mianmao cut [Yunhui] Mother and maid cut,? Yin Mi. Mi Mi, the flow of water. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】The river is full of water.　The water is full again. [Poetry·Bei Feng] There is Mi Jiying.　[Guangyun] Nu Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] is Liqie, and you? Also 【Jiyun】Mother Liqie【Zhengyun】Mo Liqie,? Yinmi. Righteous? Same.
